short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reddit with a couple tiny fixes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Updated settings UI.
- Filters out most of the "promoted" content (ads).
- Block subreddits you dislike from showing in r/all. (Add in settings)
- Shows the exact number of votes a post has. (Only updates on refresh)
- Changes button-text (such as "Award"->"Creddit", "Share"->"Spreddit" etc.)

Coded by someone who can't really code. Expect bugs.
